title: Campbell's® Tuna Noodle Casserole
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (regular or 25% Lower Sodium)
4 cups hot cooked medium egg noodles
instructions: Stir soup, milk, peas, tuna and noodles in 3-quart casserole.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 30 minutes or until hot. Stir.
Mix bread crumbs with butter in bowl and sprinkle over tuna mixture. Bake for 5 minutes more.
